en_comments: Consult local pharmacy to find clinical alternatives. Alternative concentrations/doses are available including 10 mmol Potassium Chloride in 50 mL Sterile Water for Injection (Code: JB0821P, DIN: 02241677)  or 20 mmol Potassium Chloride in 100 mL Sterile Water for Injection (Code: JB0827P, DIN: 02241677)
